scripts.bundle-webcardinal: node node_modules/octopus/scripts/run bundle-webcardinal devmode && npm run build
scripts.bundle-cardinal: node node_modules/octopus/scripts/run bundle-cardinal devmode && npm run build
scripts.bundle-minimal: node node_modules/octopus/scripts/run bundle-minimal devmode && npm run build
scripts.bundle-wiki: node node_modules/octopus/scripts/run bundle-wiki devmode && npm run build
scripts.bundle-all: node node_modules/octopus/scripts/run bundle-all devmode && npm run build
